name: Pick Your Poison (itch)
description:
Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 43

Theme: Sacrifices must be made

In this game you try to make it through all 7 hallways of the evil wizard and defeat him. The catch is, at the end of each hallway you have to drink a poison that will lower one of your skills (total health, speed, or strength). Good luck.

Support for controller and keyboard. 

Move: WASD or left analog stick.

Attack: Arrow keys, right analog stick, or X,Y,A,B buttons.

Music made by: Mikael Thomsen
Wizard Sprit made by: Warren Clark
